runs.comm: banged in short on middle and leg, gets nicely behind it and turns it in front of square leg for a single to get off the mark
rising up to the batsman, took off from short of a good length on middle, Junaid gets off the mark in an almost identical fashion, working it in the direction of square leg for a single
third short ball in a row and gets the treatment, Tamim rocks back and pulls it away disdainfully over square leg for a boundary, long hop
maintaining a shortish length but this one's not as bad as the previous one, Tamim's content to just drop it in front of square leg for a single
again, but better, on middle and off this time, gets back and pops it in front of point and cover
six short deliveries in a row and two get punished, this one's on leg stump, Junaid has enough time to move back and deposit it over short fine leg for another four, Bangladesh are away
He's continuing his partner's good work, banging it short on leg stump, Tamim manages to fend it away just behind square for a single
much fuller, finally, good length on middle, holding its line, rocks back and punches it towards midwicket from the crease
excellent fielding at short fine,full, meaty delivery on the pads, flicked away stylishly and Dale Richards reacts quickly, diving to his left to save a certain four

slower one this time and Siddique is sucked into attempting the big one, he's deceived by it and is into the shot too early as he tries to clear midwicket, gets a leading edge and Smith at cover takes it easily

Absolute rubbish! How many times have we seen him get out in that fashion? Short of a good length on middle and leg, he shuffles across to scoop it over short fine, mistimes it completely and Tonge accepts it gleefully. Atrocious shot.
negotiates it easily, on target on middle and off, hitting a good length, Naeem stays rooted to the crease and pushes it back towards the bowler
gets his length right now, on middle and leg, landing on a good length, pushed into the leg side off the back foot

gone! Reifer pulls off an excellent catch at short midwicket, lands on a good length on middle, Tamim gets forward but not quite to the pitch and turns it uppishly straight to the West Indies captain who bends low to take it inches from the ground
back of a length on middle, moves back and pushes it towards midwicket

an absolute snorter of a delivery that, banged in short on middle, shot off the pitch, leapt upto Shakib's chin and he tried to fend it away taking his eyes off the ball, it hit the handle and lobbed up but fell just short of Devon Thomas charging forward
short and wide, goes for the cut but it bounces more than he expected, zips through to the keeper
good length on middle and off, presents the straight bat while pushing it towards mid-off for a quick single
held it back, slightly short on the off stump, chopped down to third man for a single
smack, Naeem is having none of the nonsense, saw it pitched short, charged down and pulled it powerfully over midwicket for a contemptuous six, that'll ease the pressure a bit
length ball on middle, pushed wide of the bowler towards mid-off and he calls for a quick single and gets it
deceived by the slower one again, short outside off and cut away as Shakib tried to heave it over midwicket
pitched it short on leg stump as he saw Shakib charging forward, the batsman went for the pull, missed and was struck in the midriff
pitched it short way too often and he can't get away with it this time, well outside off and Shakib drags it over midwicket for a boundary, easily done
flat six, pitched up outside off, Naeem makes room and clears long-off comfortably with a free swing of the arms, powerfully struck
in the blockhole this time, just outside off, dug out towards cover from the crease
a long-off in place now, pitched on a length outside off, drilled down the ground into the deep for a single
lands on a good length just outside off, tries to swat it back past the bowler, mistimes it to mid-off
he's going for it, just a fraction short and wide, makes room to crash it over the off-side field but didn't time it all too well, just about managed to clear cover for a couple of runs
fullish on middle and leg, struck down towards mid-on for a quick single
bowled it flat and wide as he saw the batsman walking across, Shakib mistimes a slog to midwicket
quick full toss on the off stump, Shakib mistimed this one as well, slapping it to cover
tossed up on leg stump and spun in, Shakib was tempted into the loft over mid-on but he missed, just getting a thin inside edge to beat the keeper to the boundary
four more, gets it right, finally, flat and full outside off, bent low and slog-swept it over midwicket for a boundary
timber! Was too early into the sweep and Miller fired it full on the leg stump, Shakib tried to turn it fine, missed and found his leg stump in tatters
prodigious spin for Miller who shocks Mushfiqur with one that spat away from the off stump to leave Devon Thomas reaching to his right to prevent some byes
fullish on middle and leg, flicked away to long leg for a single
hurled in full just outside off, driven straight to Dale Richards who runs to his left from midwicket to prevent the single
good length on middle and off, just chips it short of deep midwicket, risky shot, for a single
lands on a driving length just outside off drawing Naeem into the shot but he doesn't connect
slower one bowled full outside off, chipped down towards long-off for a single
full and wide, gets forward and drives it straight to cover, good tight over
sharp turn again, quickish on the off stump and spins away as he gets forward to open the face and guide that past point

straying on the pads, Naeem bends low and sweeps it fine, wide of Dowlin at short fine to beat deep square leg for a boundary, Dowlin could have dived at that one but palmed it off to the fielder in the deep who had no chance
quicker one, full and wide, drilled down the ground to long-off
turning away and beats hi, as he goes for the sweep through square leg
shortish outside off, chopped down just short of point from the crease
slower one bowled short outside leg stump, helps it on its way wide of short fine for a couple of runs
lands on a good length just outside off, tries to dab it past point, gets an inside edge and it drops dead on the pitch
well played, slower one, too short, enough time to rock back and smash it over square leg for a boundary, Naeem's played a good hand here
angling it in towards middle from wide of the crease, defended with a reach back to the bowler

run-out, utter chaos, ridiculous cricket from Naeem who tries to paddle a full delivery just outside off, is struck on the pads and the ball rolls down to the keeper, Naeem goes for the run blindly even where there is absolutely no response from Mushfiqur and Devon Thomas throws down the stumps at the striker's end to find him miles short
slower one, bowled on a length just outside off, stretches and taps it down towards point
angling it in towards leg stump, worked away behind square for a single
quicker one bowled short outside off, cut it uppishly but just short of short third man
pushed down the ground towards long-on for a single
turn and bounce and Mushfiqur withdraws from the cut
straightish on middle, pushed away just wide of midwicket for a single

run-out, lazy running from Mushfiqur, it's chopped down towards point and a single is called for, Mushfiqur responds and jogs down the pitch and lethargically stretches his bat towards the crease, it's not enough as he is unable to beat Andre Fletcher's direct hit at the striker's end which finds him well short of his ground
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, defended solidly towards cover
slow full toss outside off, creamed through to deep cover for a single
darting it towards off stump, pushed through back to the bowler
slower one bowled short and wide, slashes hard and gets a thick edge down to third man for a single
fullish on middle and leg, turned into the leg side towards square leg, just clips his pads and he gets a single
another leg bye, angling it on the pads and he misses out on an attempted glance, salvages a run nevertheless
Bangladesh are sliding here, it's tossed up, lands full on middle and off, appears to hold its line and Raqibul is struck in line as he misses out on the sweep, the umpire had no hesitation there.
flat on the off stump, straight on, defended behind square for a single
flighted just outside off, driven through the line to long-off
a lot of turn there for Miller, even beat the keeper with the bounce as it shot away from leg stump, wrong line though and they get a couple of wides
fullish on middle, turned away in front of midwicket for a single
turning in from outside off, beats the attempted defense and strikes him on the ribs
quicker one bowled full outside off, dropped short of cover from the crease, watchfully played
fires it down the leg side this time, concedes a wide
another one, they need to ensure they dominate through and through, poor line
short of a good length outside off, makes room, plays it slightly away from his body while running it down to third man for a single
teasing line outside off but Mehrab Hossain jnr isn't bothered to chase it, leaves it be
slower one bowled full just outside off, cuts away as Mehrab opts to open the face and play it past point
does so successfully this time, runs it comfortably down to third man, much fuller and a bit more width for him to execute that shot
in the blockhole outside off, dug out in the direction of cover
nicely done, fullish on middle and leg, clipped away wide of short fine, and behind deep square leg for a couple of runs
fullish on middle and off, pushed straight to cover, thinks of a single but is rightly sent back
targeting middle and leg, shuffles across and turns it to short fine for a single
full on middle, dug out over the bowler's head for a single towards long-off
slower one bowled on a length on middle and off, pushed down to midwicket
too straight on the pads, elegantly turned wide of short fine for a single
low full toss on the off stump, shot back towards the bowler who fields well on his follow through
good length on middle and off, walks across and defends it towards midwicket
full and wide, chases it and fails to connect but it's wide enough for the umpire to free his arms
picked it well, full on leg stump, a gift really and Mehrab has no trouble flicking it away wide of short fine for a valuable boundary
driving length just outside off, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
good length just outside off, bunts it down the ground to long-off for a single
back of a length on the off stump, gets behind it and turns it to midwicket
slower one just outside off, targeting the blockhole and Mahmudullah fails to get his bat under it in time
slower one just outside off, gets across and drops it short of midwicket for a quick single
full toss on middle, was well above waist height, pulls it away over midwicket to beat the fielder in the deep to the ropes, is lucky to get away with a no-ball call there, was clearly one
length ball outside off, drilled down the ground to long-off for a single
straight on middle, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot

run-out, fullish outside off, tapped wide of the pitch and calls for a single and is sent back, Sammy runs forward, picks it cleanly and throws down the stumps at the striker's end to beat Mehrab's dive, eight down now
in the blockhole outside off, defended with a straight bat to cover
short of a good length on the off, played down to point off the back foot
bouncer, quick, pacy and caught Mahmudullah on the helmet as he tried to evade it, deserved a wicket, instead the helmet deflects it to the third-man boundary
another short one, Mahmudullah successfully backs away from it this time, it's short outside off
slower one, an offcutter, waited for it and ran it past point at the last moment but was unable to get the single thanks to some sharp fielding
too short and Mahmudullah deals with it well, moving back and smacking it cleanly over short fine, behind deep square leg, for a boundary to bring up the 100
slower one bowled short outside off, hangs his bat out and plays it straight to point
slightly short on the off, taps it in front of cover, calls for a single but it isn't there
short of a good length on the off stump, forced to point from the crease
fullish outside off, chipped towards long-off for a single
short, just wide, charges forward and tries to cut that through point, makes no contact
fullish on the off stump, guides it past point for a quick single
fullish outside off, makes room and slaps it towards deep cover for a single
back of a length on middle, rocks back and drops it down towards midwicket
fullish, working up some decent pace is Roach, pushed back to the bowler

run-out, on middle and leg, tries to work it towards midwicket, clips the pads on the way to Sammy at point, they opt for the single but Sammy hurls down the stumps by way of an under-arm flick at the striker's end to find Mahmudullah miles short, another run-out, the fourth of the innings
fullish outside off, bunts it down towards deep cover for a single
slower one bowled on a good length just outside off, pushed wide of cover
low full toss on middle, driven towards midwicket who's right at the circle for a single
full toss on middle, whipped away towards short fine, another run
third full toss in a row, promptly dealt with, smashed through midwicket and he earns a boundary
low full toss on middle, aiming for the yorker but not getting it right, dragged to deep midwicket for a single
easy runs gifted, the beamer outside leg stump and beats the keeper who doesn't get his body behind it, Sammy is warned by the umpire there
full on middle, gets under it and tries to clear midwicket, gets a thick inside edge towards short for for a single
full outside off, slapped down the ground to long-on for a single
